info.name: Remove Tumblr Username Popup
info.description:
Annoyed by that popup that shows up while hovering over usernames? Then be annoyed no more, a simple fix to make it disappear.

Done by request.
info.additionalInfo: DISADVANTAGES This will unfortunately remove the Notes pop-up as well, I haven't found the Class or ID to specifically target username box. However I feel like switching the style off here and there to look at the notes is far less tedious than keeping the pop up. Will update if I find username specific selectors.
